name: Easy Product Image Zoom For WooCommerce
author: AZ Plugins

sections.description:
Easy Product Image Zoom For WooCommerce allows you to add a zoom magnifier option. So your visitors can inspect in detail the quality of your products by magnifying the product images. This Product image zoom plugin offers several magnifier styles to select and configure for your product images. WooCommerce product zoom feature is the most necessary features for E-commerce websites and It increase sales by showing a clearer picture of your products.

You can see the live demo here : Live Demo

Do you have any idea in your mind to improve this plugin?
Need help to use this plugin?
Please feel free to contact us Here

Features:

  • Show a bigger size product image on mouseover.
  • 3 different types of zoom.
  • Variation proudct compatible.
  • Easy to customize.
  • Plug & Play.
  • Very lightweight, only 32(kb).
  • Works with any theme.
  • Multilanguage compatible.
  • Works with wp multisite.
  • And much more..

Pro version is also available. View The Pro Version

Options:

  • Enable or disable it on mobile devices.
  • Zoom Type
  • Zoom Window Width
  • Zoom Window Height
  • Zoom Window Offset X
  • Zoom Window Offset Y
  • Cursor Type
  • Cursor Type
  • Lens Shape
  • Lens Size
  • Enable/Disable Contain Lens Zoom
  • Window Border Size
  • Window Border Color
  • Window Border Color
  • Lens Background Color
  • Lens Opacity
  • Enable/Disable Easing Effect
  • Lens Fade In Speed
  • Lens Fade Out Speed
  • Zoom Window Fade In Speed
  • Zoom Window Fade Out Speed
  • Zoom Tint Fade In Speed
  • Zoom Tint Fade Out Speed

Pro Options:

  • Zoom Window Position
  • Enable/Disable Zoom On Mouse Scroll
  • Inclusion/Exclusion products
  • Zoom Window Position
  • Enable/Disable Tint Overlay
  • Tint color
  • Tint Opacity
sections.installation:
This section describes how to install the “Easy Prouduct Image Zoom For WooCommerce” plugin and get it working.

1) Install

i. Go to the WordPress Dashboard “Add New Plugin” section.

ii. Search For “Easy Prouduct Image Zoom For WooCommerce”.

iii. Install, then Activate it.

OR:

i. Unzip (if it is zipped) and Upload product-image-zoom-for-woocommerce folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

ii. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

2) Configure

i. After install and activate the plugin you will get a notice to install WooCommerce Plugin ( If allready have it then do not show any notice. ).

ii. To install the plugin click on the “Button” Install WooCommerce.

iii. A new submenu called “Product Image Zoom” will be appear under “WooCommerce” Menu

iv. Configure the zoom with the given options and relax!

Version: 1.0.2

  • Lens shape border radius fix

Version: 1.0.1

  • Settings page added under plugin name

Version: 1.0.0

  • Initial Release
